trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGUNI5BESTWAYSBURROW_00754_FLOPPINGWAY_000_000<tab>Me? You're speaking to <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var>? Oh, but of course! I'll answer any questions you may have.
TEXT_REGUNI5BESTWAYSBURROW_00754_FLOPPINGWAY_000_010<tab>I'm the manager and operator of the central control sphere. It regulates every single facility here in Bestways Burrow.
TEXT_REGUNI5BESTWAYSBURROW_00754_FLOPPINGWAY_000_011<tab>If anything were to happen to it, the whole place would stop working in no time. It's very important, and so is my job!
TEXT_REGUNI5BESTWAYSBURROW_00754_FLOPPINGWAY_000_020<tab>Bestways Burrow is where we Loporrits live and work in honor of Hydaelyn.
TEXT_REGUNI5BESTWAYSBURROW_00754_FLOPPINGWAY_000_021<tab>We're all doing our best to make the moon a suitable ship to transport everyone. You'll be able to ride someday soon, don't you worry!
TEXT_REGUNI5BESTWAYSBURROW_00754_FLOPPINGWAY_000_022<tab>I hear you'll be taking a different ship to travel the stars. After we spent all this time preparing the moon for you...
TEXT_REGUNI5BESTWAYSBURROW_00754_FLOPPINGWAY_000_023<tab>It's a shame to see our hard work on the ship go to waste, but I'm glad you won't be needing to escape a grim demise anymore!
